title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2022
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government
Gazette dated Thursday, 6th October, 2022 913
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 63 OF 2022
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government
By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 3)
Order, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2022.
2. A candidate for election as a Mayor or Councillor or in a Date and
district and ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination time of
nomination
with the Returning Officer on Thursday, 13th October, 2022,
for election
between 0900 hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 13th
Campaign
October, 2022, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Thursday, period
3rd Novermber, 2022.
4. (1) A poll for the election of a Councillor in a district and Election date
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Friday, 4th and time of
poll
Novermber, 2022, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward set out in the
Schedule if only one candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
914 Statutory Instruments 7th October, 2022
